headSnapshot.author: Andrew Caudwell
headSnapshot.message: Fixed build with Boost 1.89.0 by no longer linking boost system.

commitMessages.fb75cc4e3c0838c286cb174c73e601f905be9429: Added windows PATH shell script wrappers.
commitMessages.ebd5bb4076cce2820082c333e1ce5522a79e5efb: More fiddling with Qt project file name.
commitMessages.fc85f417eaba8fa692bc1e9202248eb5ad522f6d: Use https to fetch the submodule
commitMessages.1b4e37d71506e6ad19f15190907852978507fc6a: Fixed build with Boost 1.89.0 by no longer linking boost system.
commitMessages.4b3abf2b4a00b5de4a0871ae5e2a9119ae6da1c2: Change regular expression library to PCRE2
commitMessages.48eae7ffda3cba5e9cac9414f5135a55e085aac5: Added --init to help make sure the glm submodule gets checked out.
commitMessages.978431815dbdd2b973a12cc126bf18d5302b63c6: Changed Gource to run as a windows console application to improve command prompt usability.
commitMessages.96035f13ed3fe0439b6d582c9eda1618612a5e7a: Only use bloom texture with alpha channel if --transparent due to artifacts on some video cards.
commitMessages.7f769328086e164ec8c285acc054fb097da16845: Updated to latest release of FreeSans.ttf.
commitMessages.8de4a7c76d2fa9498c6a1dcad29eab258a571a0f: hg log style for Gource (courtesy of Justin Love)
commitMessages.4bcd11e971f6746c3e7dbffa1863510ab71429d9: Add test-driver used by make check
commitMessages.0419ef146878958c74cc9c520891fe14aac4c789: Allow Gource to render at native resolution on High DPI displays
commitMessages.513ef8b65e030cdc279c5ed0a13b6c15f4f5b865: Update boost and gl macros from autoconf archive for non-GNU
commitMessages.f36a26081e1221340e064c12e5e7e1a60039b1da: Updated to latest version of GL autoconf macros (autoconf-gl-macros-20100321.tar.gz).
commitMessages.fce14e2c85d443afaaed730992ed6339fe5da1c9: Use pkg-config M4 macro to detect FTGL config.
commitMessages.fb592ca3b8e926a14a5d27c8f6ad89fbab27a092: New high quality sprites. Lowered minimum zoom distance.
commitMessages.24db99616b6b266bc7b7e11a42023ba151cdfc35: Ask ps for username (getpwuid wont work for remote servers).
commitMessages.5ec56acbddd56f7f14765572c1c2e749cb284159: Fixed file removal being cancelled by an action with an earlier timestamp.
commitMessages.eb03eff397264fa56e9122c9b7071eba5c1bede9: Also unload bloom VBO when changing GL context.
commitMessages.45c5d475bbbdb937158ce83e44f0bc3da2ac2e7e: Document caption options, fixed height offset, added caption-offset option (0 to centre).
commitMessages.04bcbc5022d875d22374987169e7baebbebf2e90: Right mouse button rotation now pivots around the camera.
commitMessages.15ec93171b810c019408cb1b37041fa4103768e8: Removed some functions that didn't do anything.
commitMessages.7ed6964a93d349c5698bbd250e1fe5d8492dcd2e: Fix #214: date range handling with bzr
commitMessages.f2eb88db406b453775cc60b19fcff3f61a6f6013: Use --start-date when generating the log from the version control system.
commitMessages.a5b5b1334d299c228b948ba65d0b91c37c2352c1: Check git version to determine if --no-show-signature should be included.
commitMessages.5b2ba32f75de821bcb4935f7bfafdd05e4fdd4a2: Added class to fetch log asynchronously so the UI doesn't block.
commitMessages.3873231a34903739e472e913cdb5bfe566712999: Fixed Mercurial parser missing entries due to a buffering bug.
commitMessages.474870a3d7af80e109e3fd5ab328039c259e6821: Small tweak to avoid having 'Unknown' twice.
commitMessages.801f0a982a9b467c90ac13415b1307256000419f: Update type and location of initialization for z.
commitMessages.745f14e987986d765554fed1af6232adc33c90f3: Reload shaders with F5 to make them easier to debug
commitMessages.e5a8c3209edfea58f21f7293e3a789377f469efc: Update Gource to use latest version of Core library.
commitMessages.032558770da9b2aa1e2c0a468d3d0ea705387d65: Fixed a bug in resolving the repository root directory from a relative path.
commitMessages.5328b8c139fd0ef90d70638bed66ebfa224d914a: Fixed Ctrl-C not working due to SDL blocking SIGINT.
commitMessages.dfc3efed9c3cb7902cf418398892b952ca2c803b: Renamed GourceDemo GourceShell, Gource always run inside GourceShell.
commitMessages.d7e53a29b27d5948a2f23640fd7e0232d3532893: Fixes and additions to font colouring command line options.
commitMessages.93381d8a1238dfca893fc5db1c9806b4fdad2963: Fixed slider timestamp font not being affected by font_scale.
commitMessages.98fee80ea09042d1403855510596d26ccdae3e23: Don't allow dir-name-position to be 0.0 as it doesn't make sense.
commitMessages.127a30bf6a32238d0f5774acab0b6f2c3464f182: Allow timestamp in custom log to be a string
commitMessages.efa1b6e4287252f38ba7ea2ef919eadbc64bd067: Fixed handling of zoom distance and rotation with portrait window.
commitMessages.134a0a64877e37d717d771f88bf6b729af38e7ad: Allow caption timestamp to be be an ISO 8601 format string
commitMessages.d972ec7ac261a6efc9b91c9c3e80b7b0d36e47bc: Loading UTF8 log filenames doesn't work on Windows currently...

commits.author: Diego Elio 'Flameeyes' PettenÃ²
commits.message: Transform the build system from custom to proper autotools.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Work in progress adding config file support to Gource.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Removed Core to be replaced by a sub-module.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Using VBOs and shaders to speed up rendering performance (when available).

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Added long file extension truncation handling to file key (--key).

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Update Gource to use latest version of Core library.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Added class to fetch log asynchronously so the UI doesn't block.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Fixed texture not being updated when new characters were added to font.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Added --stop-date, adapted --start-date and --stop-date to allow specifying time also.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Use double quotes for hg log command on Windows.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Updated boost autoconf macros to fix multi-arch detection.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Changed hide tree key to T, matching documentation.

commits.author: Simon Detheridge
commits.message: Allow configuration of filename text colour and display time

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Qt Creator project file for building on Windows.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Don't multiply mouse drag distance by delta time.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Clarify that file filters are apply to the full path of the file.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Don't install FreeSans.ttf if a custom font file is specified.

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Use canonical path of font file.

commits.author: Charles Hardin
commits.message: Update boost and gl macros from autoconf archive for non-GNU

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Request compatibility profile when creating OpenGL context

commits.author: Andrew Caudwell
commits.message: Fixed build with Boost 1.89.0 by no longer linking boost system.
